item.title: Test Automation with .NET Core 6, RestSharp 1.07+ and NUnit
item.description: Test Automation with .NET Core 6, time to investigate .NET Core 6 and RESTSharp 1.07+ for Test Automation. NET CORE 6 is now stable and production ready, so I felt it was time to jump in and implement some test automation with it…
